meanings.definition: Of or relating to an opening or aperture.
meanings.sent1: The apertural window allowed fresh air to flow into the room.
meanings.sent2: The apertural gate creaked as it swung open.
meanings.sent3: The apertural hole in the fence was so small that only a mouse could squeeze through.
meanings.sent4: Her apertural smile revealed a glimpse of her excitement.
meanings.sent5: The apertural view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Serving as an entrance or opening.
meanings.sent1: The apertural arch welcomed visitors to the grand castle.
meanings.sent2: The apertural doorway led to a beautiful garden.
meanings.sent3: The apertural invitation to the party was adorned with glitter and confetti.
meanings.sent4: His apertural speech at the conference captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The apertural path through the forest was illuminated by fireflies.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the opening of a shell or mollusk.
meanings.sent1: The apertural shape of the seashell fascinated the young child.
meanings.sent2: The apertural edge of the clamshell was smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The apertural sound of the waves crashing against the shore lulled her to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The apertural colors of the oyster shell shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The apertural texture of the conch shell reminded him of the ocean.
